data.name: ELEX II Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The soundtrack features 26 atmospheric tracks by Game Director Björn Pankratz in wav and mp3 formats. Enjoy the music of ELEX II now on your favorite music player.
data.about_the_game: The soundtrack features 26 atmospheric tracks by Game Director Björn Pankratz in wav and mp3 formats. Enjoy the music of ELEX II now on your favorite music player.
data.short_description: The soundtrack features 26 atmospheric tracks by Game Director Björn Pankratz in wav and mp3 formats. Enjoy the music of ELEX II now on your favorite music player.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 145 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1096 MB available space
